contest-event.event-date: Oct. 10, 1964 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003.
